Direct Known Subclasses:
PowerUp.Friend, PowerUp.Goal, PowerUp.Music, PowerUp.Star, PowerUp.Switch
public abstract class PowerUp
extends com.brackeen.javagamebook.graphics.Sprite

A PowerUp class is a Sprite that the player can pick up.
